snippet: The death of a man who was restrained by police during a drug-fueled outburst was ruled a homicide by the city's medical examiner, New York police said, as the department faces accusations of overly harsh arrest tactics....

headline.print_headline: Death of Man After New York Police Restrain Him Ruled a Homicide
headline.main: Death of Man After New York Police Restrain Him Ruled a Homicide

lead_paragraph: The death of a man who was restrained by police during a drug-fueled outburst was ruled a homicide by the city's medical examiner, New York police said, as the department faces accusations of overly harsh arrest tactics.
